Chien

Character
06
Chiyou

An ancient genetically modified weapon that developed self-awareness for unknown reasons. A self-titeld scholar, it has wandered through New Kunlun for many years, possessing a variety of goods with obscure origins.He believes that existence has no value if one does not live for themselves. That is why he risked everything to end the life of his non-self-aware brother, Xingtian.

Character
15
Eigong

One of the Ten Sols in the Council and its de-facto leader. Eigong is a scientist who sought immortality for the Solarians. However her research leads to the awakening of the Tianhuo virus.Despite numerous centuries in attempting to cure the Solarians, she fails and instead mutates the virus. The mutation results in a hive mind connection to all infected and an accursed form of immortality. She ultimately gives up and begins to believe the mutation is the next step of Solarian evolution.

Character
13
Fuxi

One of the Ten Sols in the Council and administrator of the Empyrean District along with his twin sister. Fuxi hails from the Feng Clan, an ancient aristocratic family of the Shang Kingdom.Though he may seem frivolous, Fuxi was a responsible man and took his duties as the head of the clan seriously. He used his wealth to great effect, placing confidants all across New Kunlun and filling the Warehouse with his personal goods. He tried to breathe new life into the Feng Clan until he succumbed to an early death from the Tianhuo Virus. He could still make noises after taking Eigong's "treatment", but it could hardly be called talking.

Character
08
Goumang

One of the Ten Sols in the Council and responsible for managing agriculture on New Kunlun.Goumang's childhood experiences drove her to study agricultural technology. She believes in efficiency and the survival of the fittest. However, underneath that facade of ruthless efficiency lies more complex emotions and motives.

Character
16
Heng

Yi's Younger Sister.

Character
12
Ji

One of the Ten Sols in the Council and keeper of the Grotto of Scriptures. Ji is a mysterious immortal being and an ancient resident of Kunlun who seems to have been present throughout all of solarian history.Ji often observed the world as a bystander, following the rise and ultimate demise of countless great individuals over the centuries. These experiences made him deeply envious of those who ended their lives spectacularly and sparked a yearning in him for his own magnificent curtain call.

Character
10
Jiequan

One of the Ten Sols in the Council and responsible for overseeing the Transmutation Factory. He is the final heir to the Jie Kingdom and prefers fighting over all other forms of communication.He lamented the decline of the Jie Clan and made it his lifelong mission to return them to their former glory. His staunch belief in the family precept "Heroes are forged in agony" has led him to develop a morbid obsession with pain, which he likes sharing generously with others.

Character
07
Kuafu

Once one of the Ten Sols of the Council and responsible for managing the Power Reservoir. Kuafu is Yi's best friend and sworn brother, also an excellent engineer and a skilled craftsman.

Character
11
Lady Ethereal

One of the Ten Sols in the Council and responsible for managing the Cortex Center. Lady Ethereal is, for reasons unknown, exhibiting mental anomalies.As the creator of the Soulscape system, Lady Ethereal knew in advance that the system had major flaws. However, due to pressure from the situation, she was not able to prevent its mass deployment. The death of her colleagues hung heavy around her neck and she eventually lost the ability to distinguish between dreams and reality.

Nine Sols

Formidable rulers of this forsaken realm

Character
05
Shanhai 9000

A broken assistive robot. Unlike the other robots, it seems to be performing some other task...It once had a solarian Dusk Guardian friend who met her end when she became one of Eigong's experiments. This robot searched all over New Kunlun just to meet with her once more.

Character
03
Shennong

A brawny man from Peach Blossom Village. He is a conspiracy theorist who harbors numerous doubts and grievances towards the world he inhabits.Instead of having an unusual constitution that can kill him if he does not eat poison on a regular basis, he is relatively unabsorbed and can identify or neutralize toxins in his body. Eventually, he learned how to help others with this trait and became a leader in the Peach Blossom village. Later, people came to call him the 'Great Shennong.'

Shuanshuan

Xiaohe

Character
09
Yanlao

One of the Ten Sols in the Council and responsible for overseeing the Warehouse. Yanlao sees himself as a wise elder and attaches great importance to etiquette and propriety.For generations, his family has guarded the horde of treasures left behind by their ancestors. In his youth, he may have felt ambivalent about this mission, but as he grew older, he gradually recognized and venerated the teachings of his predecessors and became committed to maintaining those traditions.
